description: Vesta is a normal sheep in the Animal Crossing series that has appeared in every Animal Crossing game to date. Her name is a play on the word vest, an item of clothing sometimes made out of the wool of sheep, her species, and 'Vesta', the Roman goddess of hearth, home and fire (Greek equivalent to Hestia). Her initial phrase, baaaffo is a play on the word baa, the sound sheep make.
